OrgName: Pawprint Labs, Inc. d/b/a Branch Metrics
activities: Pawprint Labs, Inc. d/b/a Branch Metrics offers a sharing and analytics platform that enables mobile application developers (our “Clients”) to promote their Apps and to derive additional insights into how people that use the Internet (“Users”) download and utilize those Apps. Our clients provide us with personal data such as email address and phone number in order to setup an account. We also process email addresses and phone numbers provided to us by our Clients pursuant to their mobile App campaigns. We also collect IP address, International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI) and other forms of device identifiers which may be considered personal data when collected from Users located in the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
